p: The medical records of four Saudi patients from two related families with a diagnosis of combined immunodeficiency were reviewed. The clinical and immunological data were collected. Autozygosity mapping of all available members and whole exome sequencing of the index member were performed as previously described ( 8). Written consent was obtained from the parents. The study was approved by the Research Advisory Council at King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Center (RAC# 2121053).
